title: WireframeClip
description: Schema of clipping information for a Wireframe.

top.description: The amount of space in pixels that needs to be clipped (masked) at the top of the wireframe.

bottom.description: The amount of space in pixels that needs to be clipped (masked) at the bottom of the wireframe.

left.description: The amount of space in pixels that needs to be clipped (masked) at the left of the wireframe.

right.description: The amount of space in pixels that needs to be clipped (masked) at the right of the wireframe.
